definition: Mencius (c. 372-c. 289 BC), Confucian philosopher second only to Confucius/book of the same name, one of the classics of Confucianism
surname Meng
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Shandong is the birthplace of many famous ancient scholars such as Confucious and Mencius.
sentences.chinese: 山东是许多著名学者的故乡，例如孔夫子和孟子。

sentences.english: The third part is about the main content of Mencius Ethnological Viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 第三章孟子民族观主要内容。

sentences.english: Confucius, Mencius in on the basis of "force" the role of development.
sentences.chinese: 孟子在孔子的基础上对“武”的作用进行了发展。

sentences.english: The first chapter explained Confucius's great impact on Mencius's thought.
sentences.chinese: 第一章说明了孔子思想对于孟子的深刻影响。

sentences.english: Now it came to pass that Naas the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned is his stead.
sentences.chinese: 此后阿孟子民的君王纳哈士死了，他的儿子继位为王。

sentences.english: The subject of this thesis focuses on characteristics of Mencius's theory of heart.
sentences.chinese: 本文之主题，则集中于孟子之心学特质部份作探讨。

sentences.english: Through these questions, Mencius put forward the ultimate basis of goodness.
sentences.chinese: 通过对善的不断追问，孟子为善建构了形上学的根据。

sentences.english: Your philosopher, Mencius, lived about the same time.
sentences.chinese: 们的哲学家，孟子，生在实在同一期间。

sentences.english: Era of Confucius and Mencius in Chinese is much more spiritually much great adults.
sentences.chinese: 时代的孔子和孟子的中文是更多精神上更大的成年人。

sentences.english: No record is found in the Han Dynasty documentation of Mencius' style.
sentences.chinese: 孟子之字，在汉代文献均说未闻。

sentences.english: Mencius thinks that Heaven and human beings are interlinked.
sentences.chinese: 关于天人关系，孟子认为天与人二者是相通的。

sentences.english: Soul-searching" acquires the rich connotation in the system of Mencius ideology."
sentences.chinese: 在孟子的思想论体系中，“求诸己”有着丰富的内涵。

sentences.english: Thus, Mencius"s ideal society was enabling 70 year old people to have meat in their meals.
sentences.chinese: 所以，孟子的理想社会是70岁的人有肉吃。

sentences.english: Mencius once played truant, and she cut the cloth she was weaving to show her seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 一次孟子逃学，孟母就割断织机的布来教子。

sentences.english: He modeled himself on Mencius while he was criticizing heterodoxy and keeping Confucianism traditions.
sentences.chinese: 他以孟子为法，力辟异端，维护儒学传统。

sentences.english: Hearing this, Mencius felt very ashamed and immediately went to apologize to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 孟子听了非常惭愧，急忙向妻子道歉。

definition: Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]
Xun Zi or Hsun Tzu (c. 310-237 BC), Confucian philosopher and author of On learning 勸學|劝学
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
Han Feizi, book of Legalist Philosophy authored by Han Fei 韓非|韩非[Han2 Fei1] during the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)
the Sage Confucius
Confucius
Zhu Xi or Chu Hsi (1130-1200), also known as Master Zhu 朱子, Song dynasty Confucian writer and propagandist, founder of neo-Confucianism
Mencius 孟子 (c. 372-c. 289), Confucian philosopher
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Confucius and Mencius
Zengzi (505-435 BC), student of Confucius, presumed editor or author of Confucian classic the Great Learning 大學|大学[Da4 xue2]
Dong Zhongshu (179-104 BC), philosopher influential in establishing Confucianism as the established system of values of former Han dynasty
Yan Yuan (521-481 BC), disciple of Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3], also known as 顏回|颜回[Yan2 Hui2]
Master Zhu, another name for Zhu Xi 朱熹
Classic of Rites
